statements: UPDATE money_laundering_transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.50, transaction_date = '2020-05-15' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE money_laundering_transactions SET customer_id = 1002, transaction_amount = 750.75 WHERE transaction_id = 67890;
UPDATE money_laundering_transactions SET transaction_amount = 5000.00, transaction_date = '2023-07-15' WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE money_laundering_transactions SET customer_id = 101, transaction_amount = 7500.50 WHERE transaction_id = 4;
UPDATE potential_money_laundering_transactions SET amount = 500.25, sender_account = '12345678', receiver_account = '98765432' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET reason = 'High Volume' WHERE transaction_id = 2002;
UPDATE potential_money_laundering_transactions SET amount = 500.23, receiver_account = '9876543210' WHERE transaction_id = 101
UPDATE suspicious_transactions SET reason = 'Unusual Activity Detected', amount = 1000.50, sender_account = '1234567890' WHERE transaction_id = 202
UPDATE potential_money_laundering_activities SET amount = 500.00, suspicious_activity = TRUE WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE transaction_details SET transaction_date = '2022-03-15 10:30:00', amount = 1000.50 WHERE sender_account_id = '98765432-abcd-1234-5678-abcdef123456'
UPDATE potential_money_laundering_activities SET amount = amount + 500.00, suspicious_activity = true WHERE account_id = 'd3375404-1c6e-4265-b10d-4dcd8dcd6193';
UPDATE transaction_details SET amount = amount - 100.00, transaction_type = 'Transfer' WHERE sender_account_id = '7c8ac285-157a-4f6f-bd4a-310f87e91ea4';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000.00, account_type = 'Premium' WHERE account_id = 5678;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00, transaction_type = 'CREDIT' WHERE account_id = 12345 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE accounts SET account_balance = account_balance - 1000.00, account_type = 'SAVINGS' WHERE account_id = 54321 AND account_holder_name = 'Alice Smith';
UPDATE users SET address = '123 Main St' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 200.50, transaction_type = 'purchase' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE users SET name='John Doe', address='123 Main St' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount=100.50, transaction_type='purchase' WHERE user_id=2;
